original_title: Life's a Drag (When You're a Man in a Dress)
overview: A drag queen starts a talent contest in his restaurant in a desperate attempt to avoid a Christmas Eve eviction deadline when the 12-year-old daughter (that his ex-wife never told him about) walks through the door and upsets the already precarious balance in his life.
title: Life's a Drag (When You're a Man in a Dress)
